ing: 1 (7.25 ounce) package macaroni and cheese mix
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
des: "This is the quickest tuna casserole ever!  You can also 'fancy it up' by transferring it to a baking dish, topping it with fried onions, and broiling it for a few minutes."
ins: Prepare macaroni and cheese mix according to package directions. Stir in the cream of mushroom soup, tuna and peas. Mix well, and heat until bubbly.
